commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine cordon
commands.summary: Cordon the provided bare metal machine's Kubernetes node.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine cordon [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                        [--evacuate {False, True}]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine list
commands.summary: List bare metal machines in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine power-off
commands.summary: Power off the provided bare metal machine.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine power-off [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--skip-shutdown {False, True}]
                                           [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine reimage
commands.summary: Reimage the provided bare metal machine.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine reimage [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine replace
commands.summary: Replace the provided bare metal machine.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine replace [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                         [--bmc-credentials]
                                         [--bmc-mac-address]
                                         [--boot-mac-address]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--machine-name]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--serial-number]
                                         [--subscription]
examples: az networkcloud baremetalmachine replace --bare-metal-machine-name "bareMetalMachineName" --bmc-credentials password="{password}" username="bmcuser" --bmc-mac-address "00:00:4f:00:57:ad" --boot-mac-address "00:00:4e:00:58:af" --machine-name "name" --serial-number "BM1219XXX" --resource-group "resourceGroupName"

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine restart
commands.summary: Restart the provided bare metal machine.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine restart [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine run-command
commands.summary: Run the command or the script on the provided bare metal machine. The URL to storage account with the command execution results and the command exit code can be retrieved from the operation status API once available.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine run-command --limit-time-seconds
                                             --script
                                             [--arguments]
                                             [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--output-directory]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine run-data-extract
commands.summary: Run one or more data extractions on the provided bare metal machine. The URL to storage account with the command execution results and the command exit code can be retrieved from the operation status API once available.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine run-data-extract --commands
                                                  --limit-time-seconds
                                                  [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--output-directory]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine run-read-command
commands.summary: Run one or more read-only commands on the provided bare metal machine. The URL to storage account with the command execution results and the command exit code can be retrieved from the operation status API once available.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine run-read-command --commands
                                                  --limit-time-seconds
                                                  [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--output-directory]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine show
commands.summary: Get properties of the provided bare metal machine.

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine start
commands.summary: Start the provided bare metal machine.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine start [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine uncordon
commands.summary: Uncordon the provided bare metal machine's Kubernetes node.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine uncordon [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine update
commands.summary: Update properties of the provided bare metal machine, or update tags associated with the bare metal machine. Properties and tag updates can be done independently.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud baremetalmachine update [--bare-metal-machine-name]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--machine-details]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--subscription]
                                        [--tags]
examples: az networkcloud baremetalmachine update --bare-metal-machine-name "bareMetalMachineName" --machine-details "machinedetails" --tags key1="myvalue1" key2="myvalue2" --resource-group "resourceGroupName"

commands.name: az networkcloud baremetalmachine wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
